Title: Re: Get Vouched or Get Fucked - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Unity on July 31, 2012, 07:25 am
I learned today that the Wu-Tang Clan ain't nothin to fuck with.
I'm a big fan of talking, especially a lot, but not so much AFK. I can type novels of conversation with just about anyone who shares my interests. I know there's a lot to be said here for that very raisin.

On another note, a friend of mine payed me to have some of RedHempField's wonderful 25c-nBOME delivered to her. This was Thursday of last week (the 26th), and I ordered something for myself as well.
I live within a mile of a large and critical postal processing facility so I might just be lucky but I've always had quick shipping within the US, couple days tops. She lives around 11 miles away from me so there might be a day or so delay, one would think.
Anyway my package arrived today and everything went lovely up until at around 3-4pm I get a seriously anxiety-laden phonecall from my friend because hers is not there yet.
I was at a rolling peak on 1.2mgs 25c and if anyone is familiar with it, you know how incredible just a single 600microgram dose is. The OEVs were amazing, fractal patterns covering everything and a thin skin of kaleidoscopic shapes over nearly everything. She just started wailing about how people paid her in advance and she is dependent on the package to pay for her vehicle repair and everything she has depends on this package.
I asked how this could be, her answer was that SHE IS SELLING THE RC AS LSD!
I could not be more embarassed and disappointed. Not really shocked, just a little surprised she had joined the ranks of those miscreants who are essentially misinformation agents of the psychedelic world. Not only are you depriving those of a true LSD experience but they might not even enjoy it and never have a chance to actually take the real thing. And even moreso, that she would flip about it not being as early as expected! The sheer lack of patience was enough to turn my stomach, the other half of the problem pushing me to mental nausea.
Before she could get through her entire reason as to why she was having a cow I just cut her off with "H-hey I'm really trying to soak up this peak of psychedelia and you're really bumming me out so let me just cut through all that bullshit and tell you there is nothing to worry about; your shit will come soon enough. Try to practice a little patience. Take deep breaths."
I've never had any problem with RedHempField and wouldn't be surprised if it arrived promptly tomorrow, in which case I'm definitely going to recommend she chill the fuck out.

I couldn't even snap on her about the bullshit she was pulling in the first place. I'll probably have quite a story once/if people don't dose correctly and seek refund from her.
Thought someone else might get a kick/load of rage/case of herpes reading this.

Title: Re: Get Vouched or Get Fucked - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: BanWork on August 04, 2012, 12:10 am
Quote from: Gary Oak on August 03, 2012, 11:46 pm
Well, I finally get to try 25c-NBOMe tonight. Hopefully it helps me get out of this shit depression I've been in. :-\

I get those,  grey for days/weeks on end... it sucks. Tried all sorts of supplements. Latest one was  600mg/day of chromium picolinate (after some research into my atypical depression) with my usual multi vits, high doses of vit c, zinc, magnesium, vit b6, q10, omega 3 and some other stuff, seems to have helped take the edge off it, you never know of its placebo with supplements tho because changes are always subtle.

Recently tried all sorts of antidepressants and had a bad reaction to all of them, gave up on 'em for now. Citalopram was funky though, on the lowest dose I had hypomania after 2 days,  felt like I was on a low dose of MDMA all the time, colours where bright and vivid and I was really positive and motivated, even euphoric, couple of days later I had some horrific chest pain and the doc took me off them. He didn't believe my hypomania tho.

The only effective cure for my depression is a strict exercise program and diet (it has to be really strict)... real hard to get into when you are depressed tho. Unless I'm running 10k 4 days a week and lifting weights 3 days I tend to slump into depression. Drugs, including alcohol, always seem to make my depression much worse, main reason why I hardly use drugs these days.

Title: Re: Get Vouched or Get Fucked - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: psychedelicmind on August 05, 2012, 01:27 am
Quote from: Limetless on August 05, 2012, 01:19 am
Quote from: psychedelicmind on August 05, 2012, 01:18 am
Quote from: Limetless on August 05, 2012, 01:08 am
I got given some puff the other day by a matey and I have no rizla, what a conundrum.

Make a waterfall with a plastic bottle and you;ll be sorted!

Whats that mate?

It's a home made bong. What you do, is get a plastic bottle and burn a hole in the end of it. Then fill it with water, keeping your finger on the hole so the water doesn't come out. Take the lid off and wrap tin foil around the opening of it with a few small holes in it. Place some weed in the tin foil and keep your finger over the hole at the bottom. When the weed starts burning, keep lighting it and take your finger off the hole at the bottom of the bottle and let all the water drain out. Once the water is gone, suck all the smoke out. It is a good way of smoking! I hope i have explained that clearly enough. Reading over it and my eyes are a little fuzzy.

here is a video link:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UGpqVuJ5Xk8

Also try taking it with Mandy or Rip or another Stim, makes life way more interesting.

Title: Re: Get Vouched or Get Fucked - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless on August 07, 2012, 12:31 am
Lol I don't get special treatment from anyone mate because they dunno it's me. I wouldn't want any special treatment either.

And I can tell if it's good quality product Pickles because I have aboooout 100 liters of Acetone and 50 liters of Clorox-bleach give-or-take and glassware laying around in my unit so testing Cocaine or anything else for that matter really isn't an issue for me to do. :P

If you don't have those on hand (although you can easily buy the acetone and Clorox online for under Â£10) then you can tell if Cocaine is cut with base or other Caines because of the texture and/or the effect will be TOO numbing (pure Cocaine is only mildly anesthetic) and the buzz lasts longer than 45 minutes. If you feel wired off 100mg for 2 hours plus, your snorting a whole lot of base lol.

I've heard LiberPater has high failure rate to the U.K? Anyone confirm or deny this?

And that analogy is an understated version. My friend who sells the stuff has sold stuff that was 20% and mostly base for Â£100 a gram and people have said "Fackin blew me wig off geeza" which was the actual verbatim of the phone conversation I listened to. I buy 10g here for what equates for Â£50 a gram....do the math. People in the U.K rarely have any real idea of what good Rip really is.

And I sometimes wash it, depends how much I buy. I usually buy 5g at a time in which case I wash it, if it's anything less I don't coz then it lasts longer and 20% cut is ok in my book. I always do a mini-wash and Clorox test it for Amph and other Caines though.

they need a Rapex

http://www.patents.com/us-4508114.html

"The present invention relates to an anti-rape device adapted to be worn in the vaginal cavity of the human female. The device comprises a hollow housing dimensioned to be received within the vaginal cavity. The housing is closed at one end and open at the other end. An irritant-containing pouch is positioned within the housing. The pouch is made of material which will rupture upon forceful contact with the penis of the rapist, thereby releasing its contents. Adhesive means are also provided on the inside walls of the hollow housing for securely affixing the device to the rapist to ensure prolonged discomfort and concern only for his own well-being. "

version 2 has fishhooks inside the tube.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: gtgeorgz on August 08, 2012, 11:12 am
Does anyone who's had 2 iPhones know how easy it is to sync all your data (messages, contacts, music, photos etc..) from the old iPhone to the new one using itunes?
Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Raoul Duke on August 08, 2012, 01:04 pm
just back the old iphone up then restore it to the new one, copies everything except contacts.

the easiest way to do contacts is start a new Outlook profile, then sync your old iphone contacts only to it, then resync your new one
Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: gtgeorgz on August 08, 2012, 01:19 pm
Quote from: Raoul Duke on August 08, 2012, 01:04 pm

the easiest way to do contacts is start a new Outlook profile, then sync your old iphone contacts only to it, then resync your new one

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Raoul Duke on August 08, 2012, 01:26 pm
Yeah that outlook trick works with Nokia to iPhone as well. Make sure you do it on a new profile though cos otherwise it'll sync all your email addresses from outlook as well. Unless you want them synced

Fuck it I'm gunna show you real crazy. I sent these to RD and Shiz last night, you might all wana take a butchers -

Message 1 -

A real man stands by his woman no matter what!

And you let some people you don't know, and never will know, probably a bunch of sad fifteen year old wankers hiding in mummy and daddy's basement, well, their maturity really comes off in that way, ruin it?

REALLY?

And I am not what you refer to as a 'whore', leave that to the streets!

I am NOT a financially desperate drug addled whore!

If I choose to indulge in drugs, I pay for my own!  :)

I am on another level, I know my shit perfectly well, choose my clients very selectively, I don't see just anyone.

I do what I do because I want to, not because I have to, and I do it very well, and I am happy to come into peoples lives and save them!

I have saved marriages, I have stopped men from killing themselves, I have made many a man mentally, emotionally, and spiritually happy, there's a lot more to it than meets the eye!

If it was just about "the sex" I wouldn't do it - That would be too fucking easy, and ruin my self respect, and appreciation for myself, my mind, body, and life!

I am a carer. I am a social worker. I am a friend. I am a shoulder to cry on. I am an ear that listens. I never judge you whoever you are and whatever you do.

Yes, the time costs, and that time doesn't come cheap, but what happens in that time is priceless!

Psychologically, it can be tough though, so much shit that you have to keep in your head when your trusted, and let into someones personal life. I'd never speak of what happened within the four corners.

Even if someone put a cap to my head!

Their trust. My honour. That's the agreement!

You are aware that I operate completely above board?

You do know this is an entirely legitimate and taxable profession in this country, don't you?

There was actually NOTHING illicit or illegal there!

It didn't infringe on your security, it infringed on mine, but you know what these fuckers would never get to meet me, they'd never make it past first base!

Their call would be terminated within 30 seconds, if I don't like the sound of you, the phone goes down!

As you know, I am 'off the market' now, and obviously, it's a work number, on special mobile phone for the purpose.

Of course, you know about this shit, so no further details are necessary!

Do you know why?

Because my security is worse than yours!

Normally it takes about three to four weeks of communication before I'll even consider meeting you!

It's a very long process, but those who want it, will work with me, and those that don't won't!

I have to be 100% satisfied that I actually want to meet whoever it is!

Simple as that!

My name is unconnected now, and still you fuck me up again!

Just so you can get "bigged up and + karmaed" by these idiots that are inconsequential to your life.

Where's the karma in your IRL life, Lim, think about it!

You made the right decision there!

You can sleep well tonight!

Goodnight!

------------------------------------------------------------

Message 2 -

Well, you married me online!

Remember?

Delusional much?

No you were never my man, but I was your woman, you choose me, and proposed TO ME!

Crazy but true, huh?

ONFUCKINGLINE, messed with my emotions, and put me through mental and emotional hell, doesn't happen very often, in fact only one "man" successfully managed before, and guess what in 25 years time, you'll be exactly the same cunt!

Millions of pounds, manically depressed, on the very top, but sad, lonely, doing four grams of cocaine out of your office after hours, sleeping in your office, even spending Christmas in your fucking office, constantly paranoid about who, what, and why?

Carry on Lim, and that will be you, but it doesn't have to be!

Money the greatest of all blessings and the greatest evil!

Choices have consequences, choose wisely!

I suggest you read the message twice, think one, two, three times!

You fire the gun, at the first sentence?

Unfortunately the bullet missed the target, well it's you that mentioned target practice?

Funny that, you need some, take a night off the boards, and get some!

EPIC FAIL.

Goodnight and Goodbye!

So I gave it up for 6 months or so and then I got back into it socially and always have a nice experience when I'm with my friends. If i smoke on my own then that's when the paranoia and anxiety some times comes back. But I've never had a beautifully euphoric high like i did every time before the bad experience.. It pretty strange but I guess drugs are like that!  ???

http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/index.php/silkroad/user/d842b8827e

G, i have ordered some of Globalshippings pollen hash , Portugal / uk in 3 days. his packaging is immense. only thing is that the price of his hash really does represent the strength,

its old-skool flat pressed pollum. only  a few steps up from what us brits call 'soap bar.' its not amazingly strong, gives you a nice head buzz and a small long lasting high but it is slight, especially if your used to smoking Medical grade MJ.
i havent tried any of his 'el culero,' but iv had this style of hash before from Jezail when he was vending, its very nice.
Spanish fly's Pakistani hash is Fucking IMMENSE. stupidly strong mong-out gear. high price though =[

It's not just that mate, it's the fact that the services he offers can't really be done without compromising your anonymity. Also, the intermediate banking jurisdictions like Switzerland, BVI and Seychelles are considered ML hot-spots so nobody that knows what they are doing runs money through those jurisdictions, it's asking for trouble. I wouldn't go near there and none of the people I know that work in the field would. Back in the day they were great but they all signed DTs with the world and it's Mrs now. Sell-outs. :(

Post by: geedogg on August 12, 2012, 04:58 pm
EZ DarkMonk I kind of know what you mean, it doesn't fill you with energy and want to dance all night like pills used to in days gone by. The reason is because there were other drugs in the pills that enhanced the speedy, rushy side of the buzz which you don't get from pure MDMA crystal. You can counter this by using another drug alongside like Mephedrone, Cocaine or even Amphetamine sulphate if nothing else....That way you get the bouncy, rushy, lively effects from the other drugs you choose to take plus the empathogen, lovey, friendly, warm glow feelings from the MDMA.....Lovely jubbly!!!  ;D 8) Got to be done with other people, no good on ya own!

It makes your partner look like they are glowing with beauty. The girl I was with was already good looking but this intensified to where she looked like a Greek Goddess, and when I say glowing I mean it literally it looked like she had this unwordly glow of absolute perfection. I fucked the whole night long, and it made me such an animal! I was doing and saying things I never thought I would say, it totally unleashed any inhibition I had in me. I probably got off in her at least 5 or 6 times and the orgasm is so powerful you feel like it can't get any better or you might just pass out.

To anyone who thinks I am exaggerating I am not at all if anything this is an understatement. I don't exaggerate you can look at my reviews I give on here. Hands down the best sexual experience and 2nd best experience of my life! It makes the elixir of sex meth look like a boner pill.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: dkmonk on August 12, 2012, 06:31 pm
It produces mild visual and mild to heavy audial distortions. The room seems like it is full of smoke sometimes and music sounds so damn good (I sat and played music on my cell phone and rubbed the phone around my head from side to side because it would make me tingle down my neck and shiver) the music transferred over to a physical feeling.

I first did this drug under the impression it was an MDMA pressed pill because my friend would get thousands of them and I never had ecstasy, and I was like wow this shit is as good as they say it is. Well, thanks to old pill reports I found out it was a 5-MEO-DiPT in there and nothing else.

Yes, girls respond just the same to it. She loved it and just kept begging me to make out with her and touch her. I gave it to a different girl too, one I had just met about 2 hours before that at my friends house and about an hour after she took it, and a little bit of kissing her on the neck and touching her inner thighs she just couldn't take it anymore and pulled me to the bedroom.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: kryptoz on August 13, 2012, 04:31 pm

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: gtgeorgz on August 13, 2012, 04:38 pm
Its a bit like mdma, same sort of body high and you feel a bit of love, but doesnt have the same magic or 'openness'. It also has euphoria that's a bit like bing and apparently its a bit like speed as well. If you take it at a party you will become a gurning, dancing, euphioic mess but you can't help but love it.
its pretty addictive to say the least as well, once you have a line its hard to refuse another one, but i can sit here with it in the draw next to me and be able not to want any. :)
Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless on August 13, 2012, 04:44 pm
Quote from: gtgeorgz on August 13, 2012, 04:38 pm
Its a bit like mdma, same sort of body high and you feel a bit of love, but doesnt have the same magic or 'openness'. It also has euphoria that's a bit like bing and apparently its a bit like speed as well. If you take it at a party you will become a gurning, dancing, euphioic mess but you can't help but love it.
its pretty addictive to say the least as well, once you have a line its hard to refuse another one, but i can sit here with it in the draw next to me and be able not to want any. :)

It does have openess but not quite in the same love way, it's more everyone is your best friend and you rush with ideas and things to say. Sort of like the MDMA and Blow effect combined. :)

I'm not even the slightest bit depressed, truthfully I'll admit I'm suspended in a state of compete apathy. Curious.. how strange is it to crave utter silence while the rest of the world can't seem to shut up? I don't feel right, so please excuse my musings.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless on August 18, 2012, 12:49 am
Quote from: Raoul Duke on August 18, 2012, 12:42 am
What's the difference between MDA and MDMA. And don't say a M :P

Basically there is one more methyl group bonded on. The difference is that MDA is speedy and more psychedelic but has less roll and a different kind of empathy, MDMA is more roll, less psychedelic and more euphoric and love-giving.

They are very similar but at the same time very different. The are like the Yin to the other ones Yang. :) Taken in combination you get the full spectrum of MDxx which is a phenomenal experience.

I tried to bring MDA out ages ago when I first got here but we couldn't make it work but now we have got the facilities to do it so whilst it isn't 100% yet you'll see me bringing out my own MDMA and MDA in the near future.

Explanation + Advertising = Win

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless on August 18, 2012, 10:41 am
Ok little bit of an update on my Blow buffet delivery. C63AMG's arrived within 2 and a half days of making the order, gotta say I was fucking impressed with the speed of that. The order was very slightly underweight but I am not really too fussed about that. Product came all powder which made me quite skeptical at first but then when I smelled it it has the smell of PVA which indicates it being washed. Only thing that is odd is that the powder is quite fluffy. The high is VERY clean, I would say it's cleaner than Pfands and the onset is instant. Will be testing the purity a bit later on and will report back.

So far, very happy with C63AMG.

Whatsuppzz ladies, hows it? Much going on? Thought I'd share a story..
MrFireUk's bing is lethal, on Saturday night I went through a quarter gram of it and a quarter gram of meph in less than an hour. Seeing as I've never really done proper, strong bing before thats a hell of a lot for me. All i can remember doing is coming onto those forums on my mates computer, deciding that i was hungry (wtf?!) which resulted in me attempting to eat an out of date sandwich, which made me gag, ending with me projectile vomiting all over my mates kitchen floor, he wasn't too happy if I'm honest. ;) I also had the worst comedown I've ever experienced in my whole life  ::)
Yep, bing + meph is fucking good, but a combination that needs to be treated with respect lol.
Anyways, my blue defqons came today which I'm happy about as I'm leaving for a festival tomorrow :)

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless on August 24, 2012, 10:34 am
On principle it's easy to convert the freebase to the hydrochloride salt but it can be tricky the first couple of times. If you overdo it it doesn't knacker the Blow it just makes it extremely hard and crystalline so it's quite literally like crushing stones. It wont hurt the buzz or anything, just make be a bit sharper on the conk and it's harder to crush. There are guides on how to do it on the net, just Google it. :)

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: geedogg on August 27, 2012, 10:27 pm
Hey man, well the racemic one is still sweet too and I find it great to compliment MD or 2C-B or both!! ;) Try Ivory, I never used him but I'm going to give him a shout soon and I know Lim raves about him along with many other members...Also Googleyed I think does K and I had a great bag of 2C-B off him. Don't worry about K, just respect it!!! You need to start small then work up, just so you get a feel for your tolerance as it can be a bit nasty in a K-Hole if you don't know what to expect and batches can vary in potency!!! Lim had some good MXE I bought off him and it lasted me bloody ages!! Like 2-3 months on just half a gram!! You only need one or two lines of that stuff and the lines are fairly small, like 60-80mg, but I prefer the buzz off K myself....

MXE - Wow that is something you shouldn't miss out on! Make sure you're not planning on sleeping though... As its almost impossible to get sleep on MXE...

In made the mistake of looking in the mirror, and fuck I didn't half get freaked out, it was even worse than 2c-b for looking in the mirror on lol.

Don't take it if you want to get sleep anytime soon, I spent ages in bed trying to get sleep. My bed felt like it was floating and I was constantly hearing this weird noise.

Was an experience ;)

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Raoul Duke on September 02, 2012, 06:16 pm
my lines are pretty thin, and maybe only 2 inches long - if the cokes that good you don't need any more than that, so it would just be a waste - if it clumps up in your nose you're absorbing it really slowly, like a drip feed sort of thing. you obviously want as much to hit you as quick as possible so ideally you shouldn't snort if your nose is too dry either - its the mucus in the nose that turns the powder into a solution which makes it absorb quickest, so before you do a line, once you've blown your nose use a saline spray and then do your line.  that also does least damage because it's the fine powder particles that end up cutting through the skin in your nose, if it's already turned into a solution there's nothing hard to cut your nose up.

just call me Dr. Duke ;)
Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: gtgeorgz on September 04, 2012, 05:18 pm
Quote from: geedogg on September 04, 2012, 04:38 pm
I like K man....It's quite a lively drug in small doses! I always wanna dance....

Yeah it is, had some very interesting dance moves going on ;). I had ~15mg followed by another 15mg about 10minutes later. For about the first 2 minutes I didn't really like it, but then I let it happen and it just made me feel really nice lol. Had some very abstract/inspiring thoughts but I can't remember what they where :-\ very weird. Still got a nice afterglow going on now, 3 hours after I railed! But I can see the addiction potential so I'm keeping K for the special occasions from now on. :)
Lol, I can also see why someone on here said it was like having 'moon boots', walking was funny as fuck.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Gary Oak on September 05, 2012, 07:58 pm
Quote from: geedogg on September 05, 2012, 06:51 am
Fuck me Gary! You trippy little bastard!!  :) :) Very nice lil stash you're getting together there bro, jealous!!! You never answered me about DOB as I'm waiting on that but was asking what you thought of it??

I'm working up to getting as much of an arsenal as you man....I just want everything!!! My Coke off Northern Dancer just finally went into transit overnight....

When all this comes through I will have, also in no particular order: 2g Cocaine, 1.5g Heroin, 1g freebase coke, MDA, MDMA, Ketamine, 4-ACO-DMT, NN-DMT, DOB, 25i & c NBOMe's, Methamphetamine, LSD, 2C-B, Buds, Codeine & Benzo's......I ran out of a few drugs which I will restock on soon but others I need to try, and next on my list are Mescaline, 5-MeO-DMT, 5-MeO-MiPT/DiPT, GHB, THC Wax/Budder.....and my 5g slab of Moroccan hash, though I've smoked bare hash in the past, not had any for years!! G Dawg used to sell real nice Pollens so looking forward to that!.....6 months on and still like a kid in a sweetshop!!  ;D ;D 8)

Mephedrone is euphoric but I think coke is more so....Plus I much much much prefer Cocaine to the Drone. Each to their own though innit!

DOB is an interesting drug, I'm not sure how experienced you are with the 2C's but it's effects are a lot like 2C-B.. only the duration of the trip is somewhere in between 2C-E & 2C-G so you can expect it to begin fading after the 14 hour mark. I prefer to take it in the morning due to it's length of course. ;) The body load has never been too much to handle, although I find myself constantly flexing during the peak so anticipate waking up moderately sore the next morning. Definitely take it outside at a park or somewhere that will keep you occupied because there is no way in hell you'll be able to sit still and watch a movie when it actually hits. ;D Save it for times where you have an entire day off like at the end of a 3 day festival, or at the very least keep a benzo on hand if it seems to be dragging on longer than you find enjoyable.


I have a feeling we'd be able to throw some fucking legendary parties if the lot of us in this thread ever met. Screw Project X, that party would be for pussies compared to ones we'd throw. :P
Also I can nearly purchase from Christy Nugs speaking of hash, anyone have any experience with him?

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: sollemnis on September 05, 2012, 08:40 pm
Comparing H to Codeine is probably like comparing Megan Fox to Susan Boyle lol :P. But I can't say for sure, as the only time I've had codeine was when I took Co-Codamol tabs for a hangover :).

It's fucking nice though, I did throw up once... But it felt nice, well not nice, but it was like a real relief once I threw up... Made me feel even better :)

I don't know why I'm putting this, but speaking of 1-10 scales I'll list what I've tried and my rating out of 10. In order.

Mephedrone - 10/10 - well tbh, of the fucking scales! my personal favourite. No need to explain this one :P

Coke - 9/10 but only good quality coke. (Dutchaanbod's coke is amazing). Makes me feel like superman, makes me pretty talkative (but not as much as Meph or Speed)

MD 9/10 - It's nice, but the euphoria from MD is nowhere near that of Drone though. However the peace and love I feel for the world is unique to MD. Drone makes me feel things are AMAZING. but not beautiful.

H 8/10 - Would rate a 10, but I'm a Stim man... Plus I can see an addiction forming quite easily.

LSD 8/10 - As nice as it was, it lasted too long for my liking and the euphoria felt too natural.. Felt like I was 'earning' my euphoria as appose to the drug inducing it. But when the euphoria did hit me, it was the most beautiful feeling I've ever had.

Meth 8/10. Very nice, I felt like fucking GOD, I felt like I could go outside and throw my house as far as pluto! I felt so powerful. If it wasn't for the long comedown, this would have been good. I then bumped some H shortly afterwards. (which is when you all thought I had died lol)

2c-b 7/10, Would rate an 8, but I fucking snorted it didn't I - Heavy body load, and my sinuses felt like they were on fire. - after that, I had some nice visuals, and a nice trip, that didn't last too long. Oh and its awesome for sexual enhancement ;).

M1 - 7/10, now this gave me the BEST afterglow I've ever had. The high itself was like a weakened MD roll. but it had its own unique properties. I felt like a little kid again, and my soul felt like it had been given METH

Ket and MXE 6/10. Both nice drugs, but not too much euphoria, (not stim like euphoria anyway) good if you want to be off your fucking cake though. I prefer Ket, as it doesn't last as long so you have more control of how long you want to be high. ket is a big BANG, mxe is like radioactive material, creeps up on you, but in the end you fucking know about it.

Weed - 3/10 lol. Hate it, nice with MD and its ok with Ket. On its own it makes me feel anxious and paranoid. I wouldn't mind so much if the 'high' was worth the side effects. but tbh its not, its shit.

I think that's it... I've tried a few other things but can't think of them of the top of my head.


OH

Alcohol, 6/10 I like my booze, but I hate the hangover. And I ALWAYS wake up dying for some water in the middle of the night, then can't get back sleep :/.

Speed - 7/10, its very nice but like Meth, I get a long shit comedown and can't sleep/eat properly for fucking ages.

Anyway I was bored lol. Had to write something constructive :). When I can post this without the 'unable to connect' I'll be happy.

When all this comes through I will have, also in no particular order: 2g Cocaine, 1.5g Heroin, 1g freebase coke, MDA, MDMA, Ketamine, 4-ACO-DMT, NN-DMT, DOB, 25i & c NBOMe's, Methamphetamine, LSD, 2C-B, Buds, Codeine & Benzo's......I ran out of a few drugs which I will restock on soon but others I need to try, and next on my list are Mescaline, 5-MeO-DMT, 5-MeO-MiPT/DiPT, GHB, THC Wax/Budder.....and my 5g slab of Moroccan hash, though I've smoked bare hash in the past, not had any for years!! G Dawg used to sell real nice Pollens so looking forward to that!.....6 months on and still like a kid in a sweetshop!!  ;D ;D 8)

Mephedrone is euphoric but I think coke is more so....Plus I much much much prefer Cocaine to the Drone. Each to their own though innit!

DOB is an interesting drug, I'm not sure how experienced you are with the 2C's but it's effects are a lot like 2C-B.. only the duration of the trip is somewhere in between 2C-E & 2C-G so you can expect it to begin fading after the 14 hour mark. I prefer to take it in the morning due to it's length of course. ;) The body load has never been too much to handle, although I find myself constantly flexing during the peak so anticipate waking up moderately sore the next morning. Definitely take it outside at a park or somewhere that will keep you occupied because there is no way in hell you'll be able to sit still and watch a movie when it actually hits. ;D Save it for times where you have an entire day off like at the end of a 3 day festival, or at the very least keep a benzo on hand if it seems to be dragging on longer than you find enjoyable.


I have a feeling we'd be able to throw some fucking legendary parties if the lot of us in this thread ever met. Screw Project X, that party would be for pussies compared to ones we'd throw. :P

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: sollemnis on September 06, 2012, 02:15 pm
A gram and a half of Mandy? Fuck me, that's a lot! Maximum I've done was 250mgs in one bomb, (Was Ivory's MD) then a 60mgs top up, so 310mgs all together. But that gave me the eye wiggles to FUCK, and my jaw was saw the next day from all the jaw clenching.

A gram and a half would send me off my fucking nut! Apparently, once you go over the half G mark it gets trippy? Is that true? I've heard once you go over 500mgs, MD turns to MDA in your body. Could be bollocks, but I read it on Bluelight once. Still, hope you had a good time mate!

Yeah, it can cause anxiety. This person on another thread is thinking of combining it with Weed! Fuck me, I'd have a panic attack doing that. Weed (for me) gives me bad anxiety - hence why I don't smoke it. I've panicked from just weed itself before. Agreed though with MD its nice, I find it increases the body euphoria MD gives. And causes no anxiety and paranoia because I've got MD in my system.

Yeah street pils have Meth/Speed mixed with them. Which is why people use to say MD is stimulating, but on it's own (without any shit mixed with it), its relaxing. I even sometimes feel a little groggy on it, have you had this RD? MD on its own is  the 'relaxing' amphetamine. Surprising really, as some of it chemical structure is similar to 'Methamphetamine'.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: geedogg on September 07, 2012, 10:06 am
Yeah poppies grow virtually anywhere!!! Different Papaver Somniferum strains like diff climates and conditions...Afghan is certainly not optimal but as they have a chance to grow them there, and they require such little water, they grow unheeded!!

Coca, nah.....As said you do need the altitude and gradient so I believe. But they do produce 'Local' pills and Burma supplies H & Methamphetamine...Bud growers all over OZ. It aint too bad but they just pay through the nose (  ;) ) for Cocaine in a big way!!!! And MD too......

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless_Watch on September 07, 2012, 06:55 pm
Quote from: Limetless on September 07, 2012, 05:37 pm
And yeah nobody dies for Meph man, everything that goes to make it comes from legit companies. Not up for killing people to make drugs tbh, would ruin it for me.  :-\

Incorrect mate.

"UK
 
In 2010, unconfirmed reports speculated about the role mephedrone has played in the deaths of several young people in the UK. By July 2010, mephedrone had been alleged to be involved in 52 fatalities in the UK, but detected in only 38 of these cases. Of the nine that coroners had finished investigating, two were caused directly by mephedrone.[104] The first death reported to be caused by mephedrone use was that of 46-year-old, John Sterling Smith,[105] who had underlying health problems and repeatedly injected the drug.[106] A report in Forensic Science International in August 2010 stated mephedrone intoxication has been recorded as the cause of death in two cases in Scotland. Post mortem samples showed the concentration of mephedrone in their blood was 22 mg/l in one case and 3.3 mg/l in the other.[107] The death of a teenager in the UK in November 2009 was widely reported as being caused by mephedrone, but a report by the coroner concluded she had died from natural causes.[45] In March 2010, the deaths of two teenagers in Scunthorpe were widely reported by the media to be caused by mephedrone. Toxicology reports showed the teenagers had not taken any mephedrone and had died as a result of consuming alcohol and the heroin substitute methadone.[106][108] According to Fiona Measham, a criminologist who is a member of the ACMD, the reporting of the unconfirmed deaths by newspapers followed "the usual cycle of â€˜exaggeration, distortion, inaccuracy and sensationalism'" associated with the reporting of recreational drug use.[31]"

( CLEARWEB ) http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mephedrone#Deaths

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless on September 07, 2012, 07:09 pm
Quote from: Limetless_Watch on September 07, 2012, 06:55 pm
Quote from: Limetless on September 07, 2012, 05:37 pm
And yeah nobody dies for Meph man, everything that goes to make it comes from legit companies. Not up for killing people to make drugs tbh, would ruin it for me.  :-\

Incorrect mate.

"UK
 
In 2010, unconfirmed reports speculated about the role mephedrone has played in the deaths of several young people in the UK. By July 2010, mephedrone had been alleged to be involved in 52 fatalities in the UK, but detected in only 38 of these cases. Of the nine that coroners had finished investigating, two were caused directly by mephedrone.[104] The first death reported to be caused by mephedrone use was that of 46-year-old, John Sterling Smith,[105] who had underlying health problems and repeatedly injected the drug.[106] A report in Forensic Science International in August 2010 stated mephedrone intoxication has been recorded as the cause of death in two cases in Scotland. Post mortem samples showed the concentration of mephedrone in their blood was 22 mg/l in one case and 3.3 mg/l in the other.[107] The death of a teenager in the UK in November 2009 was widely reported as being caused by mephedrone, but a report by the coroner concluded she had died from natural causes.[45] In March 2010, the deaths of two teenagers in Scunthorpe were widely reported by the media to be caused by mephedrone. Toxicology reports showed the teenagers had not taken any mephedrone and had died as a result of consuming alcohol and the heroin substitute methadone.[106][108] According to Fiona Measham, a criminologist who is a member of the ACMD, the reporting of the unconfirmed deaths by newspapers followed "the usual cycle of â€˜exaggeration, distortion, inaccuracy and sensationalism'" associated with the reporting of recreational drug use.[31]"

( CLEARWEB ) http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mephedrone#Deaths

Son wrong again, they died because of the mix they had in their system and then it later came out that the autopsies confirmed that Meph wasn't the cause so kindly blow me. Stop following my posts around and go and get laid you half-breed cunt. Or if you wana go toe-to-toe at least use your real fucking account and stop being a pussy.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: BlarghRawr on September 09, 2012, 09:32 am
Quote from: Gary Oak on September 09, 2012, 09:06 am
http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/index.php/silkroad/item/3d9d5ea29b
I suggest that one. 90% THC and 1.1g means you get the most THC for your bitcoins. :) -- well... I should do a little math, actually.

Budder: .99g of thc for 5.99 bitcoins = 6.05 btc per gram of thc
Oil: .81g of thc for 5 bitcoins = 6.17 btc per gram of thc
wax: .78g of thc for 5.56 bitcoins = 7.12 btc per gram of thc

Now, the oil and wax might have more cannabinoids aside from thc than the budder, but... there you go. The budder is the best deal, for the thc-content.

Post by: geedogg on September 10, 2012, 09:11 am
WoooooHooooo!!! Bare sleep!!!!!!!!! Took a couple of diazies n chain smoked bongs n passed out! phheeeeeewwww!!!!

Moksha mate, Dubstep scene is kind of two tiered now....Like Drum n Bass, it has got several sub genres and to be honest a lot of it is BOLLOCKS nowadays....I used to be purely into Dubstep around 2006/7 but there is so much crunchy shit with gash vocals and is not really music....It's just a collection of rank noises & frequencies! I'm getting back to my roots n more into DnB again at the mo.

That said, I do still love the deep dubby shit like Youngsta, Kromestar & Jay5ive....Plastician with his Grimey edge, Zeds Dead are good Canadian producers for harder shit, 16bit Milky Pie Mix is just the dogs knackers from 2008!!!!!! Check it here

http://soundcloud.com/16bit/16bit-the-milky-pie-mix

and gotta love Newham Generals (D Double E) & P Money on the mic at a rave!!! BOOM!!! Was gutted to not go Outlook again this year in Croatia. AMAZING!! Anyway.....Mornin fellaz!!!!! Sorry for the babblin on!!  ;D ;D

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless on September 12, 2012, 08:20 pm
It's 98% pure Tramadol HCL mate. I never even heard of O-Desmethyltramadol, sounds fucking scary to me. Basically this is what people who make Tramadol Tablets buy to make their pills out of, we got it from someone who makes it for those kinds of companies. I'm not really into selling Opiates but Tramadol is pretty tame and I got very good prices. :)

Here are the prices -

1g - Â£10
5g - Â£40
10g - Â£80
25g - Â£160
50g - Â£280
100g - Â£480
250g - Â£800
500g - Â£1350

Post by: Limetless on September 12, 2012, 11:21 pm
Nah not if you roll it evenly so the adhesive sticks to the paper itself. You have to get the good quality ones though otherwise they can unroll. If you roll them round in your fingers over and over it makes sure the adhesive sticks too.

Quote
There are numerous dangers inherent to dealing with women, although you probably don't need to know them because you already have plans that don't involve them. For posterity, however, we'll outline the following risks: In addition to the fact that they're all batshit crazy, a man must be aware the following perils associated with pursuing a relationship with a woman:

1.    Under no circumstances should you do what a woman tells you to. You have to learn to sense what she wants, not what she says she wants.
2.    Women lack verbal communication skills, logic, and coherence in their weepy, melodramatic ramblings. Despite this, in addition to adhering to #1 above, you must create the illusion that her psychotic, incoherent babble makes sense. Failing in this, she will start to cry (see below) and the fucktarded, insane prattle will only amplify, leaving limited options to shutting her up.
3.    Dangers #1 and 2 exist because all women are attention whores. There are no exceptions. It is a law of nature and nothing can be done to change it.
4.    Incorrectly configured Toilet Seats can easily trigger #2.
5.    Through a combination of mindfucking and jiggling boobies, women will attempt to coerce men into a form of servitude known as the "Friend Zone" or worse, marriage. Both of these should be avoided at all costs, as they have all the drawbacks of a girlfriend with feeble to non-existent sex.
6.    Said mindfucking will permanently turn you into a faggot in no time.
7.    Women will call the cops if you prove them wrong too much. Aim for the back of the head - cops can't see bruises covered by hair.
8.    Never let a woman drive.
9.    Never let them read Cosmopolitan. It may trick them into thinking they have some use beyond food preparation and fucking.
10.    Medical evidence suggests women can survive on attention and sperm alone. Starve her of the former and forcefeed her the latter. If she insists on eating something other than cum, promptly induce an eating disorder by subtly asking if she's gained weight every other day.
11.    Women don't play video games. Such activities require too much of their pea-sized brains.
12.    Prolonged association with a woman will result in insanity (as theirs is contagious), staggering levels of faggotry, and ultimately an hero.

Fact: There are no girls on the internets.[no citation needed]

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Gary Oak on September 16, 2012, 04:05 am
I thought this one was great as well, it too deserves recognition. ;D

Quote
One of my favorite rap songs of all time says Bitches Ain't Shit. I couldn't agree more. Truer words were never spoken, folks. Lots of good men hook up with what appears to be decent women and eventually these men discover that there's no such thing as a decent woman. All women are bitches. All of them without exception. Your mother. Your daughter. Your wife. Your aunt. The hooker down the street. The female lawyer in her office. The female senator on the senate floor. The librarian in your town. The policewoman in the squad car. Get the picture? I know that you wish it weren't so. In all likelihood, you're a decent guy. You work hard. You're smart. You contribute energetically to society. You'd like to eventually meet a decent woman and have a family.

That's what men have been socially conditioned to look for. And men have held their part of the bargain. it's women who haven't held their part of the bargain. the thing is that women have absolutely no conscience. It's something they were all born without. Have you ever seen a woman truly feel guilt over anything she's ever done? I need you to think about this question. Seriously. Right now, you're running a thousand different images in your head. If you're honest with yourself, you will see that I am right. Women cannot feel remorse. Or guilt. That's because they have no conscience. That's why they never keep their word, unless it somehow benefits them. There are no female exceptions to the malady of remorselessness which affects one hundred percent of the female population. I'm sorry. I truly am. I wish things were different. You have no idea how much.

However, the truth must be told. There are no good women on the planet. Simply because women have no conscience. You have a better chance of meeting a unicorn in New York City. Just ask a certain European prince who married a gold-digger whom he'd been boning for three decades. As soon as she got the ring around her finger, she began singing a different tune. Acting like a real bitch. Now she wants to take him for everything he's got. See? That's what you get when you treat a bitch better than she deserves. Men were made to rule the universe and bitches were made to serve them. End of story. Anyone who disagrees should just look up statistics. In the name of equality, women in college are slashing men's sports teams and adding their own.

In the name of equality, wives are stealing their husbands estates with the complicity of judges and leaving their men at the poorhouse. In the name of justice, female murderers are given a free pass on everything they do while their male counterparts either get life imprisonment or an execution. See what I mean? It's a sad state of the affairs, folks. I couldn't make this shit up. Sometimes, I wonder why men still bother with the whole marriage thing. Or even moving together with women. Separate but equal, that's how it should be. Men should just go to work, earn a living and have fun. Don't date or marry women. Just find a slut to fuck whenever they get horny. I have a solution for that. We should legalize prostitution.

Men can spend a few hundred dollars every week and get laid by a slut who's paid to do it rather than to risk their livelihood and their lives in a relationship with a bitch whom feminist taught to have a sense of entitlement. The average legal prostitute charges a few hundred dollars for her services. The average divorce costs a lot more than that. See what I mean? It's more cost-effective for a man to seek the company of prostitutes when he gets horny than to bother with dating or marriage. It's not misogyny, just a fact. Men waste a lot of time in the pursuit of women's hearts. The truth is that men have a lot more important things to do.

We can take care of ourselves. Women play the gender card and the pity card, blackmailing the government into funding women's social service programs, women's shelters and women's resource centers. Who pays for all these endeavors? Women seldom donate to women's causes. That's why they have us men for. They smile while we do the heavy lifting. They're naturally stupider than we are. We're smart. And we pour our intelligence into things like science, mathematics, art, sociology, research, philosophy, comic books, movies, etc. We thrust human society into bold new directions with our ideas. Women never have original ideas. They have a talent for emotional manipulation, deception and sexual exploitation. There's no correlation between these attributes of theirs and a high IQ.

The dumbest woman on earth knows things about manipulation that the smartest man might not know. Why? Simply because we're too good and too smart to bother with such petty things. We were created in God's Image. Women were an afterthought. Like an extra patio after building a house. Such structures are usually redundant. What I'm asking men everywhere is to stand up for themselves. Women won't do it for them. What do women think of crazy women who slaughter their sons and daughters like a certain Texan gal and fake insanity to get away with murder? Women should be outraged. Instead, they stand by the crazy women who murder innocent men along with their sons and daughters. That's because deep down women have absolutely no conscience. They know what right and wrong are, they just don't care.

The Male Sociopath comprises five percent of the male population. The Female Sociopath comprises one hundred percent of the female population. I'm sorry if this shocks or bothers you but the truth simply must be told. The female sociopath is better at hiding what she is and what she does than her male counterpart. That doesn't mean there are fewer females among the ranks of the sociopath subspecies. It just means they're well-hidden.

Men, we are in bad shape. There are no national campaigns to help male victims of domestic abuse. There are no shelters for battered men. There are no runs for prostate cancer. No charities for prostate cancer research. No ribbons for prostate cancer awareness. Why? Simply because it's a disease that affects men and women don't give a damn about men. Even worse, men have been brainwashed to think of themselves as unworthy of being cared for. They put women's interests ahead of their own. That is such foolishness. Men need to wake up. Women don't love you. They don't care about you. They will marry you, take your money, your house, your car and your sons and daughters. And they will use the women-controlled justice system to do it. Women are always saying they want careers. Truth is they're naturally lazy. They go to college and into the formerly male-dominated workforce because they want power. They will snatch up an available man based on his financial profile more than anything else and rob him of house and home...legally! Men need to wake up and learn to protect themselves. Donate to men's causes. Open up men's resource centers. Donate to men's health research. Don't be so quick to condemn your fellow men in court no matter how guilty they appear. The truth is that manipulative women can make the most innocent of men look like monsters. And the courts usually buy into their lies. Don't buy into their lies. Protect your fellow man. Protect yourself. And last but not least, don't trust women. They're not worthy of your trust. Peace.

So how exactly is drone? I've been fucking curious but it sounds 'dirtier' than either MDMA or M1, from what I've read it seems like a cross between molly and coke? ??? Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless on September 20, 2012, 02:59 am
It's Methcathinone with an extra Methyl group added on the 4th ring position, that's all there is too it.

It shouldn't really be compared with M1, although if you were going to M1 would be like Meph's little sister. It's not as dirty as M1, in fact I'd say quite the reverse.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Limetless on September 20, 2012, 07:03 am
Lol you wont fiend, you just go through it when ya have it. And in terms of cross tolerance if you take it before MDMA or MDA it may not push through fully especially with MDMA. With M1 if you take them together it can give you an MDMA like roll and a massive rush when you snort them together. Meph is a stimulant mate, I'd recommend trying it on it's own first time round. :)

Speaking of shrooms, would I be an idiot for buying both 4-HO-MET & 4-AcO-DMT at the same time? Only problems are cross-tolerances and I have a lot of time off which makes me impatient between trips, so I don't see how I'll figure out a method to consume either one as much as I'd like too which means I might have to stash them for quite a length of time which seems like such a shame. :-\


Are there any drugs out there that I'd enjoy that aren't cross-tolerant with my beloved psychedelics? As my stash keeps getting bigger I'm finding myself at a loss of what to do without diminished effects.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: BlarghRawr on September 22, 2012, 05:57 am
I figure there won't actually be another world war, not as such. Just a giant mass extinction, because we fuck ourselves over in some other way. But, I mean...

Think about it. We've advanced too far, technologically, for a world-war to be possible anymore. Because now, it actually will be the WORLD that gets involved and the world that is at stake. That means the people will rise up, or at least that's what I hope... but everything is televised or on the internet, now. The internet has been a weapon of "social change" in the middle-east, or however the fucking media puts that... so it isn't a stretch to think that the public will look at the governments who get involved in a world war, and they'll say "No. Fuck that. Fuck you." via riots and anger.

That's what I think, at least.

i love Tylers caps, theres almost nothing out there other than DMT where you can be in a totally psychedelic world in 10 minutes time. only thing is about them though is that i like a steady come up from psychs, gently seeing the world dissolve over a half hour / hour is part of the classic beauty of tabs. sometimes smashing a cap and being in la-la land in 20 mins isnt where you wanna be.

really wanna try going raving on MDMA then hitting up a capsule. wonder how that combo would feel.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Knomo on September 24, 2012, 03:58 pm
Quote from: gtgeorgz on September 24, 2012, 12:36 am
At least you've got a dishwasher mate, lol..
Swear all you've got to do is press a button?! ;)

No man it requires 3 very complicated steps. Dishwashers are known for their steep learning curve, I mean.. after you mastered 'button pressing' you have to acquire the ancient craftsmanship of 'put the dishwasher tab in'. You think you're all set now? Not yet my friend, there's 1 very important aspect left to conquer. It requires an extraordinary combination of experience, steady hands, intelligence, finesse and a complete understanding of the universe. It's called: 'loading the dishes'. There are only a few people ever alive who truly understood that if you placed 2 plates in the space where 1 should go, the plates would remain dirty! The true heroes of mankind.

::)
Does it need sarcasm tags?

Hi Lim

Im really very sorry and quite embarrassed. Sorry,

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Knomo on October 02, 2012, 09:54 pm
Really interesting read, first chapter is about US government overreacting about 9/11 and libertarianism.

Quote
The libertarian critique of government is foundational. It says that in all times and places, the coercive power of the state violates rights, and this compulsive rights violator cannot and should not be trusted to guard our security. Moreover, because government operates outside the ownership and trade matrixes of society, it lacks both the incentive and the means to carry out an efficient provision of any good or service. Finally, the libertarian critique warns against any grant of sovereign power to anyone, for once granted, it cannot be contained and it will be abused.

I fully agree with this, too bad we don't have a real libertarian movement in Holland.
If we had one I'd definitely support it, a Ron Paul kinda guy could gain big support I reckon.

The libertarians also warned that FAA-regulations werenâ€™t really making the airlines secure. The libertarians further saw that hundreds of billions spent on â€œdefenseâ€ and â€œintelligenceâ€ werenâ€™t really providing either.

Time to buy some coke!

 ;D

But not from this account as I want to become a vendor and be an SR God who does look down kindly on his creations.

I might sell used knickers. I can sneak them out of the washing machine, if I can open it. Never used one to be honest.

Also, I could my own soiled underwear. The moral objections versus 10 bitcoins conversation in my head has already blessed this venture.

Used condoms? If there is a market I would pick them up from the local teenagers 'hang-out' or just make some myself.

I would prefer to some artwork for you but not yet, I'm busy, and not a vendor, just someone  who is interested in the study of human behaviour and this thread starter is a person of interest. Wish I could join you in the hotel room for moral support and to perhaps photograph the developing scene for the sake of 'art'.

Can photograph hookers also as long as I blur out the face.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: BlarghRawr on October 14, 2012, 07:55 am
Funny story, that. About a year and a half-ago or so I was on 4chan browsing /b/ and some folks had a thread up about the "deepweb" and oh how it has all this crazy shit on it and all that. And I've used tor before, I've poked a .onion url or two already but that night I was just like... "Eh, why not." and I loaded up the hidden-wiki... after about 10 minutes of it failing out on me. Mostly because the idiots were talking about how you can "buy assassins!!!11one". And I browsed on down the list of links and I came across the drug-markets, and I thought to myself "... Drugs? Online? I'm in!" so I opened them all... and only the Road loaded. And then the next day, Adrian Chen posted his gawker article about the Road, I guess.

Before the user IDs were changed to hashes, I was number 25##. I don't remember the exact number but I know I was, just barely, ahead of the first rush... by a couple hours. As for the forums, I guess I just got lucky in checking the same day it was announced. I didn't even realize I was one of the first until a few months ago when I looked at the memberlist by the date-registered order.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: shiznit on October 17, 2012, 11:15 am
i had this posted in another topic, but it was deleted.


what i find interesting is all these people in the knitting circle putting their piece in, when they dont have facts. only those directly involved know whats happened, thats joey and hoffa and/or MIA

i look at it like this. MIA sells gear to aussies. lots of it im guessing. lets put a figure on that. i would say an ounce a week? maybe more..... (lets just do the coke figures)

now how much is that bought for off SR. average rate, lets say $3000 for an ounce of washed coke.
now thats broken down to $107 per gram. now resell that in aussie, on SR, for say $350 a gram. and lets be honest, thats going to fly off the shelves.
now 350 x 28grams = $9800

lets say $400 a gram (still going to sell, judging by the rates of other aussie coke sellers)

28 x $400 = $11,200

now maybe im a retard, but honest to fucking christ on a cracker, WHY THE FUCK WOULD SOMEONE RISK THEIR REPUTATION FOR CHUMP CHANGE
and thats what it is. the figures dont lie. , to those saying hoffa started threads and planned this from the start, clearly you have been here for 10 fucking minutes.
you want a scam, search tony, search ptp, fuck the list goes on. now those were planned scams.. tony was hundreds of thousands of dollars.

i would say a goose is easily parted with his monies, 
posting private conversations and throwing accusations on half a dozen different threads etc...  thats fucked. trying to reveal details about someone from inside information is even more fucked.
you didnt even email him. messages on SR are a dime a dozen for a busy vendor. you should know that.


hate me for saying it, i dont see a  premeditated  "scam" .

i see someone whos name was dragged through the mud...who  had enough of someone posting their private conversations, offered a resolution, to which he was called more names.
there is only so far you can push someone before they push back harder. had you not posted all that shit joey, im 100% certain you would have got your money back..


but im just another random on an anonymous drug forum.
bring on the flaming retorts ;D, or did i make some sense?

ok lets talk about names dragged through the mud shall we.
he promised me acid crystal within 3 days of me completing payment.
then when i finished paying him he gave me a bullshit message about needing some chemical then disappeared for 3 weeks with no word.
what do you think this did to my rep irl? i had made promises to other people based on his rep and what he'd told me.

the mia account didn't have anywhere near the amount of activity you suggest.
he only had completed 200 odd transactions anyway.

both accounts disappeared for weeks after pocketing my money so
i assumed he was a scammer and so i put all that info up on the forum for communities benefit.
why would i bother messaging a scam account on the forum that hasn't been active since sep 21?

i took down all that shit when he asked me to and he said he would send the coins.

how are you 100% certain? privy to some leet inside info that we might be interested in?
no of course not, just a lowly peasant like everybody else...

i never called him any names, i asked if he was mental. yes.

i get your pissed cause you didnt hear from anyone, but you also didnt email hoffa, or MIA?. both have their emails listed, and are not hard to find.
shit how you think i got in touch? i pm'd you asking if you had emailed him..

why didnt he contact you over those three weeks you say? why was hoffa offline for so long? why was MIA offline for the week... i dont know. you dont know?. he hardly got the chance to explain.

maybe he was in hospital. maybe he was away for work, he has many posts on his vendor page over the last few months about having work commitments. maybe his mother was ill and passed away..............................the list goes on. no-one knows. this is anonymous drugs. and im guessing there was a reason he was unable to log in. MIA certainly would not be the first vendor since SR started that went offline, then came back, having had health issues, or whatever.
did he get a fair chance to explain? i dont know. if i was ill and saw all this, not to mention someone trying to tie a buyer profile to a vendor profile, i would be pissed!

 you had posted all these threads slandering him. i dunno, maybe its me, but if someone had that amount of money of mine OOE, i would do everything in my power not to piss them off.
if you were watching the MIA thread, you would have noticed there was fuck all, but rumors on there. shit i was guilty of gossip too asking where he was


im not saying what he did is right or wrong in the aftermath... no doubt it would be cutting you up.

why am i posting.. i dunno.... i have talked to hoffa online since the start, hes never done wrong by me.

i assumed he scammed me weeks ago after he gave me his bullshit story then disappeared.
everything i did after this point was from the perspective that he had already run with the money.

the part that pissed me off was that he'd logged in to the vendor acct and ignored my pm's,
that's why i didn't bother with alternate communication methods plus i knew he was the same person. that's also what made me think he was a scam.

i honestly was just trying to expose what i saw as a massive scam operation.
that's why i published those convos and i took it down basically as soon as he came back.
i know it's fucked up i really should've given him another chance
i honestly didn't expect him to come back at all, i was certain he was scamming

i guess i did overreact looking back on it, i shouldn't have gone for the jugular straight away,
i should've given him the benefit of the doubt maybe once more given his rep
but it's too late for that now and there's no way to know for sure
ultimately he still did end up scamming me tho and the way he reacted doesn't really do him any favors

i dont get the hoffa and mia connection at all. i have nothing to do with any of this, im just bored i guess .

but i do know that hoffa sent a shit ton of coins around today. from what i know for sure it was a $1000usd to a few members atleast. not sure why he would do that.

people talk of community. and inner circle. and what not. Yeah i have a group of people i PM regularly. but in the end we are all just anonymous avatars. we help each other with info and scammers and shit. but in the end. trust no one.

the deal was that mia would hold on to the crystal and coins,while i slowly paid off what i could to him.
once i reached about seven grand or so he said he would release the coins to hoffa and the lucy to me.
of course he upped that to 9k once he realised what a stooge i am  :-[

that's why there could be no escrow, the nature of the deal relied completely on trust

and about the money he's thrown around today,
he's had about 7k of mine for 2 months about half that he's had for probably almost 3 months and almost 10k for 3 weeks now

by this stage he could have used those coins over and over to make profit from, i know that's what i would've been doing  if i had some chump just handing them to me, '
he could have feasibly tripled or quadrupled that money by now in the market down here, so i'm not really that surprised he's got a lot of coins to throw around.
i think it's fucked that people are accepting them when they know full well where they came from.

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: gtgeorgz on November 16, 2012, 03:11 am
I agree, its a shame, SR just doesn't have that magic it used too. I mean its still an amazing site, obviously but I miss when it used to be a small(ish) community where people were sensible and actually knew a thing or two about drugs. Trolls/spammers/noobs were pretty much non-exsistant as people actually bothered to spend some time researching on this site and BTC. I mean shit me, it took me 6 months after I first signed up with SR to feel confident enough to place an order. Even then I still shat myself constantly for 2 days straight waiting for it to arrive.
Now people just seem to take this wonderful opportunity for granted and don't respect what DPR and the rest of the admins are doing, it's really sad. I have utmost respect for what they have done for us by creating this site, just a shame that then it goes down for a few days 95% of people here (mostly newbies) just go completely ape-shit causing a scene and do not appreciate what the admins are doing.
I really miss the chat shit group, lim, gary, gdog, moksha, shiz, knomo, RD.. etc.. you know who are you are. Wish we could someone get it back to what it used to be, but who knows.  :(
I also wish SR would no longer be mentioned in the press, because as you say.. it just brings annoying kids/trolls to the site who think they know everything when in reality they are pretty much ruining the forums.

Yes Pharmacy is what I want to get in to. What about you? Telling you what mate, its hard aiming for Pharmacy because its a long way away & with all the drugs I've done, I already know a lot of it. The amount of times I've had to self medicate. Like when I over did it on Speed/Drone if I statred feeling overstimulated/panicky.. what did I do? Take Diazepam! Because believe it or not, Diazepam or any Benzo doesn't effect BP or heart rate much, so using it for  a stim OD isn't harmful, in fact, its how people in hospitals get treated for an OD of stims. Also, in the UK, they mostly use Diamorphine (heroin) for acute pain not Morphine.

I just love how drugs are used to make people feel better! I love the whole subject.

Hows your life been GT? You enjoying College/Uni?

And haha GT, fill me in kid! You couldn't get it up? Don't fucking blame you! I can't on MDMA either! Speed is another story, I'm wanking like a bastard, with all these dirty thoughts in me head! Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: gtgeorgz on December 24, 2012, 12:38 pm
Alright guys, whats everyone up to for xmas then? Hoffa, shiz long time no speak!
Pretty much had my first 'bad trip' on friday. Got my mate to measure out the doses of 2c-b, which was of course to much (must have been 30/40mg+). I snorted this on the the peak of an mdma/ketamine high and shit got really fucking intense. At first I was enjoying it, but when my mate started freaking out proper bad and running/screaming into walls, then I didn't feel so good. The visuals were scary and I kept forgetting where I was/who I was. Plus being at a party where there were non-trippers as well weren't the best ether. I didn't exactly panic or lose my mind completely, but it wasn't a nice experience. Definitely learned a lesson from it though. Do NOT get your mates to measure out doses for you!
Anyway, merry xmas!

Post by: Gary Oak on December 28, 2012, 04:36 am
I've been suicidal again as of late. Given away everything in my stash for free other than a little less than half a gram of MDMA, some Ayahuasca mix, a dash of DMT, and an eighth of weed. I've been tossing most of my personal belongings that I think are unnecessary, all technology for the most part. I've broken off practically every friendship that meant something to me and now all I want to do is sleep. I don't know what I'm doing anymore and I almost want to reveal myself just to see what would happen. What's wrong with me? Why do I do the things I do to myself? I really want to be happy but I hurt myself on purpose out of anger despite everything. Why I'm on here admitting these things that are of no importance to anyone I don't know but maybe it's a relief to have someone know what I'm going through that has absolutely no comprehension at all of any of it.  :-\

    While it's great you're trying to help your friend, and I hope he get's the help he needs to fight the injustices he's facing. After all the dramas he's supposedly gone through over the last few months it's time he finds a new hobby.
     

Well that is just it. He is a kid who hasn't learned from his mistakes. He kept telling me that this time there was no way for him to get caught. He told myself and one other person. Unfortunately for him that one other person had a run in with the law and rolled on chaosforpeace for everything. I believe he can get out of the serious charges if he just had a good lawyer. In my opinion they are missing allot of proof. As it is they are trying to stick him with a mandatory minimum of 20 years, probably more."

PLEASE PAY ATTENTION TO THE SPELLING OF ALLOT, AS MOST SPELL IT "A LOT" OR "ALOT" BUT FEW SPELL IT "ALLOT"

now look at a post from 4/15
http://dkn255hz262ypmii.onion/index.php?topic=148971.msg1027942#msg1027942

"Silk Road discussion / Re: Someone ordered 25 kilos from China 21 days ago
Â« on: April 18, 2013, 02:21 pm Â»
Dr. Gonzo is one of the most trusted members of the road. If this was fake than Dr. Gonzo would have been charged an SR fee for buying his own item. At 70,000$ Dr. Gonzo paid SR 1,050$ in fee's.
Most likely this is just a buyer who purchased from the Docter multiple times so he trusts him. It would show allot on how trustworthy the Docter is because if someone else was in the same position with 70,000$, well would you do the same and ship the product or keep it?

Chaos
"
[/quote]

PLEASE PAY ATTENTION TO THE SPELLING OF ALLOT, AS MOST SPELL IT "A LOT" OR "ALOT" BUT FEW SPELL IT "ALLOT"

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: iLoveTaffy on June 06, 2013, 09:22 am
If I tried coke or meth, I would be climbing the walls. I can't even IMAGINE using it. You should see me on OXYCODONE. Even THAT is activating to me (yes, it's far more energizing than morphine-based opiates, but it's still an opiate). One sip of coffee and I'm up for days. Caffeine, stimulants, all of that, destroys me. Even SUGAR. (And I LOVE taffy... obviously).

I would love to try coke, but no. Never. I'd rather try meth because I prefer smoking though. Still, I have a meth pipe, I just use it for DMT.

Downers. I love them. Even benzos. They don't help me sleep, but I've taken upwards of 1g of diazepam and I've never been more relaxed (except on heroin, clearly).

Tell me, what does coke do for you? I'm incredibly curious.
Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Raoul Duke on June 06, 2013, 09:33 am
ever done speed? well decent coke it nothing like it, despite people calling it 'poor mans coke'. decent coke is a real subtle buzz, you do a line and you're sat there for the 1st 10 minutes thinking 'man i've been robbed' then another 5, 10 minutes later when you've forgotten all about it you'll catch yourself in a proper in depth conversation with anybody, whether you know them or not, and you have something to say on ANY subject, even shit you know nothing about, and you just feel like the MAN, it is TOTAL confidence in powdered form. a lot of people say it makes you arrogant - proper coke doesn't, it just makes you supremely confident in yourself. cut coke can and does make you arrogant, had plenty of that shit and got into a lot of arguments because of it, but the really decent stuff gives you more empathy, so you can relate to what people are saying to you rather than just fucking their opinions off and laying down your own. proper coke makes you funnier to other people, whereas cut coke just makes you think you're funny while others think you're a bit of a nob. it is my DoC without a doubt, but it's so hard to find proper coke, hence me completely clucking after KB, and in general preferring mandy. you can sleep pretty easy a couple of hours after your last line as well if it's not cut.

don't like speed at all, tried meth once and have a scar on my face as a reminder that i don't like that either.

do like a valium just to mong out on the couch on a sunday, they're really nice the day after a pill. do like H as well, but have zero self control when it's in the house - i did write a thread about it 'if you're thinking of trying heroin...' on here somewhere

I would die from exhaustion. My body HATES stimulants, because it's already so monstrously stimulated to begin with. That's why I love downers.

My drug of choice is DMT, simply because I can use it more frequently, it doesn't last too long so I can use it quickly before going out or something, and it's not addicting like heroin is.

If I could use heroin nonstop without killing myself, however, I would.
