Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: iLoveTaffy on June 06, 2013, 10:18 am
Yeah, that's pretty impressive. Coke is so addicting, simply because the come down is shit. But it seems you're taking super clean and pure coke, so I bet the come down is way better.

Does a valium help with the come down?

And yeah, 9 days. The most, without drugs, I've styed awake is 8 days. I have the worst insomnia case I've ever seen. It's miserable and hellish. I'm testing GHB right now (once it comes in) for sleep. Right now, I will use heroin for my "third day of the week" just so I can get a few hours of sleep in. The heroin I've got now is banging, but I've had better. The bags are also very light (and a couple were almost completely empty, it's depressing). Quality is great though, and he made up by throwing in lots of extra bags. Still not as much as I should've got, but the price and quality make it worth it.

I would pay a premium for 90%+ pure #4 though. A match sized bump... When I insufflate, I usually bump at least .15g. I have a very high natural opiate tolerance though. A nice .15g bump of the heroin I have now can even knock me out if I let it. I can fight falling asleep and just get nods, but damn, I love the fact that potent opiates knock me out (diacetylmorphine, oxymorphone, hydromorphone). Oxycodone is wonderful because it desn't make me sleepy in the least, so if I'm not wanting to nod, but I want a great opiate high, I'll take oxycodone. Not often though, simply because of the price and I prefer the nod that heroin gives.

If you can barely handle insufflation of heroin, if you bang it, you'll be gone. Don't do it ever. Stick to insufflating every once in a while. Avoid the needle at all costs. I do it for price reasons and the fact that I have severe pain, and I'm able to control it... at least thus far. If I ever feel myself slipping though, I will simply sell my stash. I refuse to slip into the realm of a "stereotypical junkie."

Nobody knows I use drugs in real life, except marijuana. Nobody. (I have a lot of naloxone. I refuse to go to an ER if I OD. I will just dose myself with naloxone until it's gone from my system. Better safe than sorry, and I CANNOT be caught using heroin).
Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: Raoul Duke on June 06, 2013, 10:51 am
there is no comedown with proper coke, and for me a little line, probably less than .1 keeps me chatting for a good few hours, but it's a relaxed buzz, nothing like a rush, so it's possible to sleep on it. its the cut stuff thats more-ish and fucks up your sleeping pattern, the good gear you can just forget about it completely after a line. IME, and seeing my mates, coke is only addictive if you've got it - if you don't have it it just doesn't bother you. seems to be like that for all my mates

my whole family knows about the coke, mandy and pot but the mrs would leave me if she knew i tried H. couldn't give a fuck about what other people know about me - 'who the fuck are you to judge me' kind of thing, so i'm quite happy wondering arouns supermarkets stoned out of my box with glowing red eyes

would ask pineapplelove to send it to where he gets all the other shit tested, but for Â£10 a point i really dont wanna fork out just to see

negatory symptoms: NOT paranoid, no burn tooting it, not totally 'can't feel my face' numb

positively symptoms: just the right amount of numbing, jittery, starey eyed, struggle to get your words out, damp as fuck (hotplated to get it lineworthy), shiny but not hairspray shiny, gurning. knackered - i could sleep right now if i wanted. probably should as i got skool tomorrow

Not really reliable in that sense and that's why I pretty much just buy locally now again unless I fancy some random shit I can't get or if there's a special product on here....Oh and Meth!! LOL Probably buy that once a month...

Woke up at 5am today....Sucks balls!! Especially as I don't have to be awake....  ::)

Quote from: Koltbiz on July 09, 2013, 07:15 am
Don't be lazy people, I just tested some listings to see what the new fees were.

Here are the results:

$5 -> 10%
$25 -> 10%
$75 -> 9.5%
$125 -> 9%
$175 -> 8.5%
$225 -> 8%
$275 -> 7.5%
$375 -> 7%
$500 -> 6.25%
$750 -> 5.30%
$1000 -> 4.75%
$1500 -> 4.25%
+$2500 -> 4%

The calculations were made by (POSTcomm - PREcomm)*0.01 = %

Koltbiz

http://dkn255hz262ypmii.onion/index.php?topic=181513.0

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread

it's probably always worth washing it unless it hits you like it should ;) if you can get any chloroform that gets rid of speed and ephedrine, but i'll be damned if i know where to get any of that from!

bit of a problem is coke is completely soluble in chloroform so you need to do it properly. quite good destructions here - http://www.bluelight.ru/vb/threads/193299-How-to-clean-up-adulterated-cocaine

I've always found that it's best to take MD first and then the Meph. Taking Meph first ruins the MD for me but the MD doesn't ruin the Meph... I think this is due to the fact that like Coke, Meph acts on dopamine quite a bit, whereas MDMA acts mostly on just serotonin. But I hope you're having a good night! :)

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: sollemnis on August 06, 2013, 01:41 pm
Geedogg, respect right there bro! You must have the will power of a god!! Did you shoot H or just smoke/snort? As nice as I found it, I only took it nasally so I do not know how the 'rush' feels...

Yeah duke I've heard loads of stories about tuesday blue's, it sounds horrible! I've never experienced it, this is most likely because I haven't done MDMA loads and loads of times... I've done it a lot, but I don't think I've done it enough to give me that sort of 'hangover'.

The fact you weren't keen on Meph is complete proof of how drugs effect us all differently.. I honestly love Meph and the Meph/M1 combo is almost unbearably euphoric for me.. I've never found MDMA to be that euphoric, maybe a 6/10 on the scale. I would say though MDMA is the overall better drug, it's not as fiendish as Meph and not as stimulating which makes it a better option for an overall easier night. I honestly get proper gutted when I run out of Meph haha.. whereas MDMA is a nice slow comedown and most of all I can still sleep that night. Yeah Meph ruins your nose, I've always recommended bombing 200mgs of it so you get the duration advantage of taking it orally. Then after that just snort 50mg top ups or so. Still, it can temporarily ruin your nose, but not as much.

What are you all up to today anyway?

Title: Re: READ FUCKING FIRST POST! YOUR NAME MUST BE IN IT - The Verbal Diarrhea Thread
Post by: sollemnis on August 07, 2013, 10:08 pm
As always it depends on how intense you want it to be ;). I would say for a solid experience bomb 180mgs of M1 and do a 100mg line of Meph as you're coming up on the M1.. The rush is intense. Lim advised me that it was good to train track them but I've always found M1 to be better taken orally...   M1 being less effective nasally is just my experience, though I've read elsewhere that's the case as well. Have you ever tried bombing Meph? I've always been a fan of bombing some Meph and then having a line whilst I wait for the oral dose to hit me... IMO this gives you the duration benefit of taking it orally, and the nasal benefit of a better rush + more intense experience. I do about 50mg top ups nasally after the initial doses.

Ahh that's where I'd have to disagree, Ive always found Meph to be much more euphoric.. but equally I've found that MD is the safest bet in terms of its no where near as fiendish and makes for an overall nice experience.

Haha first ever K hole in a club? How was it? Where did you travel to? haha.. I remember my first K Hole vaguely but I've never been able to remember in any sort of detail exactly what I experienced.

I'll definitely try that combo mate. I'll make a night of it soon.
